title: Cryptolist24
author: Cryptolist24
content: The dev team did a great job in recent time.You can check all the updates on their medium: https://ghostbymcafee.medium.com/Their roadmap is online at: https://ipfs.ghostbyjohnmcafee.com/#/roadmapI see GHOST as a promising project with strong fundamentals of which there are not many.Additionally I think the whole market for privacy coins will gain a lot of attraction in the future...What do you think about the project?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Is this a paid advertisement, or are you the representative of the Ghost privacy projects? because this post looks like shilling to me. You could have dropped detailed information regarding the project because not everyone might have the time to go through an entire blog or even trust a link posted by a newbie enough to open it. If you are not part of the project, I will really advise you to stay off such projects. Read a few lines of their content; they look interesting since they are all about privacy protection, hiding the user's identity, etc. The project looks pretty old, and they have come a long way. But looking at their few listed exchanges, I will advise you to stay off buying such coins or tokens because you never know what will happen next in the coming days: no active trade, low volume, orders very weak, etc.

comments.author: Cryptolist24
comments.body: Thanks for your response.I am a holder and community member since the beginning.GHOST hast started as a erc-20 airdrop to ESH holders. Since then it was a crazy rollercoaster but the project did very well in the last year.A new team came up and fixed a lot. Now it has its own blockchain and is working fine.The APY for staking is 11% and by holding more then 20k GHOST it is 29%.I think it is a really cool project and should deserve more attention.Especially because there was a lot of development in recent time.For example GHOST Sheltr, a mobile wallet which comes as a PWA (Progressive Web Application).Soon they release wrapped GHOST on the polygon network which should bring some more liquidity.And it is possible to send, recieve and stake GHOST with a telegram bot called GHOSTpay. I‘ve posted the links because they give a detailed overview how the project is going…As I am not deep in coding I would be curious what others think about the last developments.To me it looks pretty good.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptolist24 on April 24, 2023, 08:05:44 PMWhat do you think about the project?There's nothing special about this project, I know you have explained everything about the development of $GHOST, but those are all mainstream developments that happen in the privacy coin project (IMO). The price for the $GHOST token is also very volatile, you can see it on the chart at CMC. The exchange that listed $GHOST is also not a top exchange like TradeOgre and StakeCube. If it continues like this, it will be very difficult to increase its market capitalization.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: The way I see this is that some random people suddenly showed up trying to revive a dead project. You came here and posted it in the hopes that you could help in reviving this coin. I don't blame you for doing that since you're a holder. It sucks when your money is stuck and this is probably your way of getting out at break even. You could get lucky since there are times when crypto goes crazy and some unknown coin or token unexpectedly pumps.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptolist24 on April 24, 2023, 08:05:44 PMWhat do you think about the project?Haven't heard of it, not sure if there is a ANN thread for this project, if not then it might be good if the project itself will create one in this community. If there is, then the OP should continue his shilling of it in their ANN thread because he/she didn't offer something new here. Just the normal "I'm a bag holder" promotion and everyone should get on board because it's a promising project.Sorry to burst the bubble, usually this kind of shilling might back fire hard on the project itself. No need to hype if the project is real or if it has potential to be big in the future, just saying.

comments.author: Cryptolist24
comments.body: Thanks for the feedback!As a underdog and a privacy coin they did great with restoring the blockchain. The anon transactions get up to 32 ring signatures. Also the staking features are nice and the new released PWA wallet feels well coded.If you hold over 20k GHOST you get a reward, called veteran reward. Before the team has paid out this reward manually. Now the pay put is programmed and when you hold over 20k in your wallet you get the reward automatically.And the dev team has released a program called GHOST vault which you can run on raspberry pi for anon staking.Everything is working very good.I am just surprised why it gets no attention.
